column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4551_c994d2e769239036626fe51c59daea4085fc3d54/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te
Good catch. \nI'd prefer put the CloseSocket(...) just before the `return false;`, instead of interleaving it with the logging/error code (same comment for the change below).\n
Thanks, changed to what you suggested :).\n
